name: Large Citrine Healing Headpiece
description:
Exquisite Silver Chain Handmade Headpieces with High Quality Beautiful Crystal/Stone Pendant/s!

Headpieces are One Size Fits All & Adjustable, with extra links. 
Each Crystal/Piece is Cleansed & Smudged before being sent and only filled with the most positive intensions and love vibrations!

Only A+ High Quality Crystals that are Ecologically sourced are used in our Crystal Headpieces.

Our Headpieces are... 
MORE than a Fashion Statement 
MORE than a Beautiful Accessory 
they are what they are called, HEALING PIECES!

A great alternative to a healing stone worn around the neck, wrist or ankle and a great way to keep your stone of choice sitting on your Third Eye.

Lovingly Handmade in Australia.

name: New Slim Clear Quartz Healing Wands! (Purple or Maroon Velvet & Black Leather)
description:
These gorgeous handmade Crystal Healing Wands are leather and velvet (purple or maroon) bound, giving a comfortable grip & beautiful appearance.

Healing wands gather and direct energy. The elongated, cylindrical shape of a wand enables the stone or crystal to direct its healing energy in a straight line, and the wand's point focuses the crystal's energy so that it can be used on specific areas of the body.

This healing wands point is beautiful Clear Quartz. Quartz is a Master Healer stone. It is an excellent all purpose crystal healer stone. It is said to amplify healing energy and is used to perform diagnostic healing. It has been used historically to detect food poison. It is said to draw out pain. Quartz is used in crystal healing to strengthen all body systems. Quartz is reputed to be particularly effective for chronic fatigue, arthritis, bone injuries, depression, diabetes, fibromyalgia, intestinal troubles. It also is said to improve mental and physical energy, stamina, and physical strength .

name: Custom Crystal Healing Wand (Choose - Crystals, Size & Materials!)
description:
Custom Crystal Healing Wand!

Your choice from Healing Stick or S, M or L Crystal Healing Wand...
Your choice of Crystal point...
Your choice of High Quality Ribbon or Velvet 
Your choice of Colour of Ribbon/Velvet &
Optional Extras being Leather Tassels & Small Gemstone decorations.

Perhaps you love our Healing Wands but would like a specific Crystal/s incorporated/used in our creation for you? That's where our Custom Orders come in handy. Our team is extremely friendly and happy to converse with you in hope of creating an amazing product that you love and that means something of importance! We put a lot of handmade love into our wands and sticks here at www.astrobodyscrystalhealingwands.com and cannot wait to hear from you!

All Wands & Sticks are handmade with beautiful high quality leather and other materials.

options.name: Small Wand, Custom Point. Choose from Ribbon or Velvet & Colour of R/V.
Medium, Small Wand, Custom Point. Choose from Ribbon or Velvet & Colour of R/V.
Large, Small Wand, Custom Point. Choose from Ribbon or Velvet & Colour of R/V.

name: Handset Crystal Wand (Citrine & Moonstone)
description:
Beautiful handmade Handset Crystal Wands by 'Flink' of Wild Earth Unique Gifts, Torquay, Australia. Stunning glass wands with incredible soldered steel wrap and decoration.

This wand combines Citrine (Protection & Abundance) and Moonstone (Grounding & Persistance).

artists.name: 'Flink' From Wild Earth Unique Gifts, Torquay.

name: Small Crystal Healing Stick (Blue Lace Agate)
description:
This gorgeous handmade Crystal Healing stick is black & brown leather bound giving a comfortable grip & beautiful appearance.

This healing sticks point is beautiful Blue Lace Agate. Blue lace agate is a gentle, calming stone that engenders tranquility and grace. Blue lace agate brings with this calm and tranquility a lessening of anger, even deep anger issues, and a calming of nervousness. It is even considered a happiness stone from these harmonious energies it carries, as well as one of hope..

Spiritually, blue lace agate assists in flight, grace, reaching higher Spiritual planes, communicating with angels and activates the throat chakra. It can help bring stronger intuition and inner knowing through this contact with higher Spiritual planes and angels. Inspiration is another hallmark of blue lace agate and that can assist in inner attunement, and has been said to be useful for performing miracles.

Our Crystal Healing Sticks are great as a gift, keepsake or ornament. These sticks can definitely be used as a healing wand but are a great present for someone you know may like the idea of a healing wand but might not use it for healing purposes but rather something pretty to keep. For whatever purpose this stick fulfills it is sure to help heal whomever it comes into contact with.

name: Small Crystal Healing Stick (Roze Quartz & Gemstones)
description:
This gorgeous handmade Crystal Healing stick is leather bound and decorated with three gorgeous Gemstones, giving a comfortable grip & beautiful appearance.

This healing sticks point is beautiful Rose Quartz. Rose quartz is often called the "Love Stone." It's energetic hallmark is that of unconditional love that opens the heart chakra. This makes rose quartz a stone for every type of love: self-love, family, platonic, romantic, and unconditional. As a variety of quartz, rose quartz has high energy, and this strong energy can enhance love in  virtually any situation.

This stone of unconditional love that opens the heart chakra to all forms of love: self-love, family love, platonic love, and romantic love. The high energy of quartz gives rose quartz the property of enhancing love in virtually any situation. Bringing love in to life and daily situations not only brings inner warmth, but it also lowers stress and soothes those around it. Rose quartz is a very happy and loving stone.

Our Crystal Healing Sticks are great as a gift, keepsake or ornament. These sticks can definitely be used as a healing wand but are a great present for someone you know may like the idea of a healing wand but might not use it for healing purposes but rather something pretty to keep. For whatever purpose this stick fulfills it is sure to help heal whomever it comes into contact with.

name: Small Crystal Healing Wand (Kyanite, Clear Quartz & Amethyst)
description:
This gorgeous handmade Crystal Healing Wand is leather bound, giving a comfortable grip & beautiful appearance.

Healing wands gather and direct energy. The elongated, cylindrical shape of a wand enables the stone or crystal to direct its healing energy in a straight line, and the wand's point focuses the crystal's energy so that it can be used on specific areas of the body.

This healing wands point is a combination of beautiful Amethyst, (Amethyst is a meditative and calming stone which works in the emotional, spiritual, and physical planes to provide calm, balance, patience, and peace.) Clear Quartz (Quartz is a stone of clarity which dispels negativity and clears away negative energy. It can be used to purify and clarify on the spiritual, mental, and physical planes. It is powerfully protective because of these properties. Quartz enhances spiritual growth, spirituality and wisdom. Because it clarifies thought processes and emotions, it can increase inspiration and creativity. It can also help particularly with concentration, studying, and retaining what one learns. Quartz is also a stone of harmony because it balances energies, and is even helpful in romantic relationships.) and Kyanite (Kyanite inspires loyalty and fair treatment to others. It assists in working through disagreements and disputes, and can aid in repairing damaged relationships. It is beneficial in negotiations, diplomatic missions, arbitration and other forms of communication between disharmonious people, allowing disparate energies to move into resonance and find a common frequency.).

name: Medium Crystal Healing Wand (Chrysoprase & Gem decorated Tassels)
description:
This gorgeous handmade Crystal Healing Wand is leather and ribbon (grey) bound, giving a comfortable grip & beautiful appearance.

Healing wands gather and direct energy. The elongated, cylindrical shape of a wand enables the stone or crystal to direct its healing energy in a straight line, and the wand's point focuses the crystal's energy so that it can be used on specific areas of the body.

This healing wands point is beautiful Chrysoprase. Chrysoprase is used to speed the healing of any wound. It should not be placed on the body, but held over the affected area. Carry a Chrysoprase in a pocket to help heal. Also keep a Chrysoprase close to your bed at night to speed healing.

Chrysoprase is used as a shield or protector from negative energy. A small bowl of Chrysoprase kept by the front entrance of the home is a very wise procedure. If used in jewelry, Chrysoprase should only be set in silver and has more power carved in the shape of a heart.
